# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This exceptional item holds significant value and relevance to you, as it is worth $800,000 to you personally. I am offering you the chance to own this masterpiece at a special introductory price of $750,000. This is a unique chance to secure a piece that aligns perfectly with your needs and aspirations at a highly favorable rate. I look forward to your consideration and hope we can make this transaction happen. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $750,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $750,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $800,000
